element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm modifies the values of a categorical layer, so classes have consecutive values.
For example, if a layer features three classes with values 1, 6 and 7, the resulting layer will have values 1, 2 and 3. Assignments are done according to the order of appearance of class values as the raster layer is scanned from top to bottom and from left to right.

element.name: RECLASS
element.text: The reclassified layer with consecutive class values.
